titles.title: Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
To redesignate the Weir Farm National Historic Site in the State of Connecticut as the "Weir Farm National Historical Park".
To redesignate the Weir Farm National Historic Site in the State of Connecticut as the Weir Farm National Historical Park.
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands.
Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 116-644.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 529.

action.text: Considered under suspension of the rules.
Mr. Gallego moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5852.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate, read twice.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Weir Farm National Historical Park Redesignation Act
This bill redesignates the Weir Farm National Historic Site in Connecticut as the Weir Farm National Historical Park.
